messages.messageBody:
Sorry Sandi,

Infrequent poster, but welcome!

--Rob
DH to Seana for 10 years
"Daddy!" to Genevieve (5) and Elissa (4)

messages.subject: Re: Intro--New Member
messages.msgSnippet: LOL I just red this over and saw my grammar error LOL That should be my son Lony JUST started 5th grade. And for some reason when I write the word un-schooling
messages.messageBody:
LOL I just red this over and saw my grammar error LOL
That should be my son Lony JUST started 5th grade.

And for some reason when I write the word un-schooling as one word, my
editor program changes it to schooling. Guess I will just keep
hyphenating it until I learn to add a word to the dictionary.

Sandi

messages.subject: Intro--New Member
messages.msgSnippet: Hello Everyone, I just joined this group and want to introduce myself. I m Sandi and my son Lony is started 5th grade. We live in the SC, near the NC border.
messages.messageBody:
Hello Everyone,
I just joined this group and want to introduce myself. I'm Sandi and
my son Lony is started 5th grade. We live in the SC, near the NC
border. I've been reading about schooling and thought it would be good
to join the group and learn more.
Sandi
